channel.title: Leonidas Simopoulos's blog
channel.description: Recent content on Leonidas Simopoulos's blog

item.title: First post
item.description: This is my first post. I used hugo to make this blog. i totally recommend it. Its easy and really quick to create a blog without the need to install anything. public class Application { static void Main(string[] args) { Console.WriteLine("I posted my first post. yay !!"); } }
